data.title: Trixie (film)
data.text:
Trixie is a 2000 American mystery-crime film directed by Alan Rudolph and starring Emily Watson, Nick Nolte, Will Patton and Brittany Murphy.

The only crime she couldn't solve was the murder of the English language. taglines

Dialogue

[edit]

Trixie: You gotta grab the bull by the tail and look it in the eye.

Trixie: Soon somebody could get killed here, and die!.

Red: I am Red Rafferty.

Red: This is my boat.

Trixie: I know this is your boat, you're Red Rafferty.

Red: Thats what I said.

Trixie: Do you hear yourself talking when you speak?!

Trixie: It's brains, not bullets.

Trixie: I'm a private defective.

Trixie: It's time to fish or get off the pot.

Trixie: I've an ace up my hole.

Dex: I've got 20/20 hearing.

Trixie: I'm not going to let you drink yourself to Bolivia.

Trixie: My sister's having a baby, but I don't know if I'm going to be an uncle or an aunt yet.

Taglines

[edit]

The only crime she couldn't solve was the murder of the English language
